meanings.definition: The quality or state of being voluminous.
meanings.sent1: Her dress had a certain voluminosity that made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The voluminosity of the clouds in the sky indicated an impending storm.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to squeeze into the tiny box was comically hindered by its voluminosity.
meanings.sent4: The voluminosity of the library's collection was like a vast ocean of knowledge waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the voluminosity of the mountain in his painting, making it seem almost real.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of something in three dimensions.
meanings.sent1: The voluminosity of the box surprised me as it could fit all my belongings.
meanings.sent2: The voluminosity of the sculpture made it a striking centerpiece in the gallery.
meanings.sent3: The voluminosity of the cake was so immense that it took the whole table to display it.
meanings.sent4: The voluminosity of the tree's canopy provided ample shade on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the voluminosity of the mountain range, making it seem almost touchable.
